text: The CECAFA U-15 Championship is a football tournament organized by CECAFA. Held for the 1st time in 2019, it includes national under 15 teams from East and Central Africa. ==Past winners== {| class="wikitable" border="1" width="500px" |- ! Year ! Winners ! Scoreline !
